comments:
I have installed Eclipse 3.0.1 4-5 days ago. It started normally, I have been 
working with it. Now I started it today after installing a few more programs 
(Oracle f.e.), I get the logo, then an alert popup that "An error has occured".

?kos

Eclipse requires a 1.4 level JDK. From the log I see you are running with the
1.3.1 VM.
